activities: Personal Information Received From the EU: Recombo does not share, sell, rent, or offer any databases containing end-user personal information in the course of its business operation. Recombo uses web-based tools to communicate with customers and potential customers. These tools include web-based questionnaires and surveys that allow respondents to provide business-related personal information such as name, title and contact information. Recombo's Agreement Express web-based contract management service stores on secure servers, end-user name and email address solely for the purposes of accessing the system and electronically signing documents.
